results.title: Statins suppress cell-to-cell propagation of alpha-synuclein by lowering cholesterol
results.text_hl: High-fat diet feeding worsens @<m>DISEASE_Synucleinopathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000080874 @@@synucleinopathy@@@ phenotypes, an effect reversed by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment
